shadowman.filter
Interface StatementDistribution

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BloomFilterStatementDistribution
public interface StatementDistribution
extends Serializable

A probability distribution that will define if a PentoQuery will return results from this distribution.

Nested Class Summary

Method Detail

exists

StatementDistribution.StatementDistributionExistence exists(pento.model.Statement stmt)
Parameters:
stmt - Statement to check the existence for. Set the subject/predicate/object null to find the particular existence. For example, if you want to find the existence of a particular subject, leave the predicate and object null in the statement.
Returns:
StatementDistribution.StatementDistributionExistence existence of the Statement in this Distribution

add

void add(pento.model.Statement statement)
Parameters:
statement - Statement to add to the distribution

serialize

InputStream serialize()
                      throws IOException
Serialize the underlying distribution for transfer over the wire

Returns:
The InputStream of the underlying distribution. For example, a bloom filter would return the binary representation of the bloom filter underneath
Throws:
IOException

load

void load(InputStream inputStream)
          throws IOException
Reload the underlying distribution completely. This operation should overwrite the underlying distribution completely

Parameters:
inputStream - The representation of the probability distribution
Throws:
IOException - If the incoming stream is not compatible with the format expected
